Module kivakit.serialization.gson
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.factory

Interface GsonFactory

All Superinterfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Nameable, NamedObject, Receiver, Repeater, Transceiver, Transmitter
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGsonFactory, KivaKitCoreGsonFactory
public interface GsonFactory extends Repeater
Creates Gson instances
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • addConvertingSerializer

      <T> GsonFactory addConvertingSerializer(Class<T> type, StringConverter<T> converter)
      Adds a serializer for the given StringConverter.
      Parameters:
      type - The type for the converter
      converter - The converter

    • addInstanceCreator

      <T> GsonFactory addInstanceCreator(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.InstanceCreator<T> creator)
      Adds a Gson InstanceCreator to the builder that creates a Gson when gson() is called. The InstanceCreator is used to create new instances of a type during deserialization.

    • addJsonDeserializer

      <T> GsonFactory addJsonDeserializer(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T> deserializer)
      Adds a JsonDeserializer to the builder that creates a Gson when gson() is called. The JsonDeserializer is used to deserialize fields.

    • addJsonSerializer

      <T> GsonFactory addJsonSerializer(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T> serializer)
      Adds a JsonSerializer to the builder that creates a Gson when gson() is called. The JsonSerializer is used to serialize fields.

    • addJsonSerializerDeserializer

      <T> GsonFactory addJsonSerializerDeserializer(Class<T> type, JsonSerializerDeserializer<T> serializerDeserializer)
      Adds a JsonSerializerDeserializer to the builder that creates a Gson when gson() is called. The A JsonSerializerDeserializer is a typesafe KivaKit interface for objects that are both a serializer and a deserializer.

    • addTypeAdapterFactory

      GsonFactory addTypeAdapterFactory(com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory factory)

    • dateFormat

      GsonFactory dateFormat(String dateFormat)

    • exclusionStrategy

      GsonFactory exclusionStrategy(com.google.gson.ExclusionStrategy strategy)

    • gson

      com.google.gson.Gson gson()
      Supplies a thread-safe Gson instance by creating or reusing one
      Returns:
      The instance
